article_title: With Pitches and Poise, Yankees’ Severino Looks as Good as Advertised in Debut
article_text:
The man of the hour, Luis Severino, leaned up against the wall of his locker deep inside Yankee Stadium like he had owned it for years. He chatted happily with anyone who sought him out. He smiled constantly, but not the ecstatic smile of a 21-year-old who had just done something few 21-year-olds have ever done: battle the Boston Red Sox at Yankee Stadium. Instead, it was the easy grin of a man who knew he belonged, and never doubted that he would reach this level.

Across the Yankees clubhouse, veteran third baseman...

The man of the hour, Luis Severino, leaned up against the wall of his locker deep inside Yankee Stadium like he had owned it for years.
Across the Yankees clubhouse, veteran third baseman...
He smiled constantly, but not the ecstatic smile of a 21-year-old who had just done something few 21-year-olds have ever done: battle the Boston Red Sox at Yankee Stadium.
Instead, it was the easy grin of a man who knew he belonged, and never doubted that he would reach this level.
He chatted happily with anyone who sought him out.
